mint(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: function to create a linear vesting schedule

params.amount: The total amount of tokens to be vested
params.duration: The total duration of the vesting schedule
params.to: The beneficiery of the vested tokens
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to be vesting,e.g., DAI

returns._0: scheduleId The unique Id of a vesting schedule
